channel.title: Comments on: Mashable:MySay is Twitter for Talkers

item.title: By: aido
item.dc:creator: aido
item.description: Ok, already impressed :) Sign up is simple and the SMS notification of what to do next rocks! Nice.
item.content:encoded:
Ok, already impressed Sign up is simple and the SMS notification of what to do next rocks!
Nice.

item.title: By: aido
item.dc:creator: aido
item.description: I'm going to sign up and give it a shot. But, will be as popular as twitter? Twitter has a web interface, IM (if you dont want to get caught twitting in work) and SMS notifications i.e. you get the message and can then make an informed decission to respond before forking out for the cost of a call or sms. Saying all that always willing to try new things ... oh and very best of luck!
item.content:encoded:
I’m going to sign up and give it a shot. But, will be as popular as twitter? Twitter has a web interface, IM (if you dont want to get caught twitting in work) and SMS notifications i.e. you get the message and can then make an informed decission to respond before forking out for the cost of a call or sms.
Saying all that always willing to try new things … oh and very best of luck!
